snippet.title: Glyph - Nintendo Switch Demo Trailer - ESRB
snippet.description:
Glyph, an atmospheric 3d platformer that combines aerial maneuvers with exploration, now has its very own free demo on Nintendo eShop. 

3 exclusive levels have been made for the occasion, with a total playtime of approximately 45 minutes, and will be available for everyone to download from May 16.

Give it a try, as Glyph doesn’t come fully alive until you play it yourself!

EU Shop - http://bit.ly/Glyph-EU
US Shop - http://bit.ly/Glyph-US 

More details:
Website: https://playglyph.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayGlyph
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayGlyph
Discord: https://discord.gg/FCQj4C5
